During  its  June  1,  2022,  inspection  PHMSA  observed  the  lack  of  line  markers  placed  at  the 
aboveground Perkiomen and East Perkiomen MLV sites.  The Perkiomen MLV is located within 
a High Consequence Area (HCA) adjacent to a children’s playground and public picnic area.  Note, 
Adelphia’s 18-inch diameter southern portion mainline was commissioned on March 31, 2022. 

Therefore, Adelphia failed to meet the requirements of §192.707(c).
